== HankBrake ==

"HandBrake is a tool for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs."

=== Installation ===

<nowiki>[[InstallingSoftware|Install]]</nowiki> the <nowiki>[[apt:handbrake|handbrake]]</nowiki> package from the Universe repository.

Alternatively, there is the <nowiki>[[apt:handbrake-cli|handbrake-cli]]</nowiki> package for a command-line interface.
